mapper.select: SELECT fg.family_group_id, fg.family_name, fg.club_id, fg.main_contact_id, mc.actual_name as main_contact_name, fg.description, fg.create_time FROM m_family_group fg INNER JOIN m_family_member_relation fmr ON fg.family_group_id = fmr.family_group_id AND fmr.is_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN m_member mc ON fg.main_contact_id = mc.member_id AND mc.is_delete = 0 WHERE fmr.member_id = #{memberId} AND fg.is_delete = 0 LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM m_family_group WHERE club_id = #{clubId} AND family_name = #{familyName} AND is_delete = 0
